title: Time to Snow
team: Myeongseong Kim, Sunwoo Baek, Woohun Lee
summary: An interactive installation that displays the current time with snow-like tiny Styrofoam grains and provides viewers experience of being in snowy weather.
By using tangible material like snow, it shows well the aesthetic beauty and ephemerality of snow.

paragraph: An interactive installation that displays the current time with snow-like tiny Styrofoam grains and provides viewers experience of being in snowy weather.
By using tangible material like snow, it shows well the aesthetic beauty and ephemerality of snow.
The viewers can interact with Styrofoam grains, like playing with snow in nature.
